# flowgraph Documentation Index

> Go library for graph-based LLM orchestration with checkpointing, conditional branching, and multi-model support.

## Quick Start
- CLAUDE.md (247 lines) - Project overview, key patterns, quick reference
- pkg/flowgraph/doc.go (171 lines) - Package documentation with examples
- docs/OVERVIEW.md (334 lines) - Vision, core concepts, use cases

## Architecture
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md (686 lines) - System design, type definitions, execution model

## Implementation
- docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md (452 lines) - Porting from Python, common patterns
- docs/GO_PATTERNS.md (457 lines) - Go idioms, gotchas, production patterns
- docs/TESTING_STRATEGY.md (597 lines) - Test patterns, coverage requirements

## API Reference
- .spec/knowledge/API_SURFACE.md - Complete public API documentation

## By Topic

### Graph Definition
- docs/OVERVIEW.md#core-graph-concepts - Nodes, edges, compilation

### Execution
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md#execution-flow - Run algorithm, checkpointed execution

### Checkpointing
- docs/OVERVIEW.md#checkpointing - MemoryStore, SQLiteStore

### LLM Clients
- docs/OVERVIEW.md#llm-client-interface - ClaudeCLI, MockClient

### Testing
- docs/TESTING_STRATEGY.md - Unit tests, integration tests, coverage

## Examples
- examples/linear/ - Basic linear execution
- examples/conditional/ - Conditional branching
- examples/loop/ - Retry loops
- examples/checkpointing/ - Crash recovery
- examples/llm/ - LLM integration
- examples/observability/ - Logging, metrics, tracing
